\## Checklist

\- \[ ] I created `agents/<slug>/agent.yaml`

\- \[ ] I created `agents/<slug>/README.md`

\- \[ ] README includes at least 3 example prompts

\- \[ ] `slug` in agent.yaml matches the folder name

\- \[ ] I added limitations/safety notes

\- \[ ] No secrets, tokens, or sensitive data included

\- \[ ] I ran: `python runtime/cli/agentctl.py validate`
